# contains(_:)

**Instance Method**

Returns whether the receiver contains a specified point.

## Declaration

```swift
func contains(_ p: CGPoint) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **p**: A point in the receiverâ€™s coordinate system.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the bounds of the layer contains the point.

## Hit testing

- **hitTest(_:)**: Returns the farthest descendant of the receiver in the layer hierarchy (including itself) that contains the specified point.
